title: Device Problem Codes
description: IMDRF Annex A - Codes for categorizing device problems

codes.name: Adverse Event Without Identified Device or Use Problem
codes.description: Adverse event occurred but no device or use problem was identified
examples: Unexplained patient reaction with device functioning normally

codes.name: Device Operates Differently Than Expected
codes.description: Device operates in a manner inconsistent with its intended design

codes.name: Device Displays Inaccurate Data
codes.description: Device displays data that does not accurately reflect actual values
examples: Glucose meter showing incorrect blood sugar

codes.name: Unexpected/Excess Radiation Output
codes.description: Device produces more radiation than intended or expected
examples: X-ray delivers higher dose than programmed

codes.name: Device Interaction Problem
codes.description: Problem related to interaction between device and patient, user, or other devices

codes.name: Incompatibility with Another Device or Product
codes.description: Device does not work correctly when used with another device or product

codes.name: Electrical Problem
codes.description: Issues related to electrical components or function

codes.name: Arcing
codes.description: Electrical discharge through air between conductors

codes.name: Burn Out
codes.description: Component failure due to excessive current or heat

codes.name: Corrosion of Electrical Contacts
codes.description: Degradation of electrical connections due to corrosion

codes.name: Electric Shock
codes.description: Patient or user received electrical shock from device

codes.name: Electromagnetic Problem
codes.description: Issues related to electromagnetic interference or compatibility

codes.name: Material Problem
codes.description: Issues related to materials used in device construction

codes.name: Material Integrity Problem
codes.description: Material has lost structural integrity

codes.name: Break
codes.description: Material has broken into separate pieces

codes.name: Crack
codes.description: Material has developed cracks

codes.name: Delamination
codes.description: Layers of material separating

codes.name: Fragmentation
codes.description: Material breaking into small fragments

codes.name: Material Deformation
codes.description: Material has changed shape inappropriately

codes.name: Material Deterioration
codes.description: Material has degraded over time or use

codes.name: Mechanical Problem
codes.description: Issues related to mechanical components or function

codes.name: Blockage
codes.description: Flow path or mechanism is blocked

codes.name: Dislodgement of Device or Component
codes.description: Device or component has moved from intended position

codes.name: Failure to Deploy, Expand or Release
codes.description: Device did not deploy, expand, or release as intended

codes.name: Failure to Lock, Seal or Maintain Position
codes.description: Device did not lock, seal, or maintain position

codes.name: Leak
codes.description: Device is leaking fluid or gas

codes.name: Loosening of Device or Component
codes.description: Device or component has become loose

codes.name: Non-Sterility
codes.description: Device that should be sterile is not sterile

codes.name: Packaging Problem
codes.description: Issues related to device packaging

codes.name: Packaging Damaged or Defective
codes.description: Packaging is damaged or defective

codes.name: Packaging Integrity Problem
codes.description: Packaging seal or integrity is compromised

codes.name: Power Problem
codes.description: Issues related to device power supply

codes.name: Battery Problem
codes.description: Issues with device battery

codes.name: Battery Depleted Earlier Than Expected
codes.description: Battery ran out before expected lifetime

codes.name: Battery Failure
codes.description: Battery completely failed

codes.name: Software Problem
codes.description: Issues related to device software

codes.name: Application Program Problem
codes.description: Problem with device application software

codes.name: Firmware Problem
codes.description: Problem with device firmware

codes.name: Operating System Problem
codes.description: Problem with device operating system

codes.name: Software Calculation Error
codes.description: Software produced incorrect calculation results

codes.name: Thermal Problem
codes.description: Issues related to device temperature

codes.name: Overheating
codes.description: Device became too hot

codes.name: Labeling, Instructions for Use or Training Problem
codes.description: Issues with device labeling or instructions

codes.name: Incorrect or Missing Expiration Date
codes.description: Expiration date is wrong or missing

codes.name: Incorrect or Missing Instructions for Use
codes.description: Instructions are wrong or missing

codes.name: Output Problem
codes.description: Device output is incorrect or problematic

codes.name: High Output
codes.description: Device output is higher than intended

codes.name: Low Output
codes.description: Device output is lower than intended

codes.name: No Output
codes.description: Device produced no output

codes.name: Failure to Operate
codes.description: Device failed to operate or turn on
